meanings.definition: A unit of linear measure equal to 3 feet (0.9144 meters)
meanings.sent1: The garden was only a few yards away from the house.
meanings.sent2: The football field was marked in yards for the game.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked yards past my destination!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement stretched for yards when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The cat stretched out for yards in the sun.

meanings.definition: An enclosed area in which a game, such as football, is played
meanings.sent1: The children played tag in the school yards.
meanings.sent2: The football players gathered in the yards to practice.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought the football yards were a giant playground.
meanings.sent4: The yards echoed with the cheers of the fans.
meanings.sent5: The yards were filled with excitement during the championship game.

meanings.definition: A piece of land adjoining a building or house
meanings.sent1: She loved to tend to the flower yards in front of her home.
meanings.sent2: The yards behind the house were perfect for a vegetable garden.
meanings.sent3: The yards were so overgrown, they looked like a jungle!
meanings.sent4: His kindness extended for yards beyond his property.
meanings.sent5: The yards were a peaceful retreat from the city hustle.
